text: Nɨ 7plan azenibar mɨtiriar ekiam nɨn kantrin otivasa, nɨ ifonge? O, apaniba izɨ ia mɨsogh ian agɨntɨghtɨ, ia arɨ mangɨ 3plan iakɨnibar danganir igharazibar ikiam? O, Ikiavɨra Itir God arɨmariar kuratam amadaghtɨ an enselɨn dafarimɨn nɨn kantrin gumazamiziba 3plan aruebar me bativam? Nɨ bar deraghvɨra nɨghnigh uan ifongiamɨn na mɨkemeghtɨ, kɨ uamategh mangɨ na amadazir Godɨn mɨkɨmam.”
